this is motoi
urlLink Ma premiere photo sur internet
Now i should be able to writte my own post. With my own account. Please motoi, take care of the design of this web blog !
urlLink All members urlLink

Hello all. I just discover how to use the blog. That's a great idea and you have been really quick yan. I'm looking for a picture of all of us. The small family. It seems that i need a link or something like that... i don't know. Yan if you can tell me how to set a picture under my message. Romain...

We will leave frölunda. But the memory will stay in this web space. Our story will continue here. Please write down your news, and put on your new pictures. Let the family members know how is your life going. At last, remember the link of the website.

It is ok. Not very nice but ok. I hope it is not too ugly. I wasted around 130kr on the curtain. I have bought the second nicer curtain. I will go to Paris and some cities in Italy from July 14th to July 24th. I have ordered plane tickets. It can be a big adventure for me and my mother. All together is 10 days. Sorry to Romain that I have no time to visit you because of my tight schedule and budget. Hope you have a nice summer with your family.

>yan i'm enjoying your nice pictures. is it true that you falled into river? it's really funny:) by the way, how do u change room? i'm expecting to see your new room. recently i'm renovating one old room. my sister manage small private school now, but the classroom was so old and dirty. then, it becomes my job that i change everything from floor to wall in the room. of course after completing, i can get some money from my sister, so it's really job. but it's bit tough job.. >romain it's nice to get Murakami Haruki's novel. please read it and tell me how you feel it. recently i'm busy because my job of renovating. hence, i dont have time to take nice picture. but i'll take it. you can also upload your nice picture, can't you?
The canoe trip are published by Yan, not Julien. I just used 'soromantic' to login. So my name became Julien.
urlLink canoe urlLink
urlLink canoe in a nice river urlLink
urlLink canoe in a nice river urlLink

I had a canoe trip on Friday. We went to a canoe trip in Nosebro. It is very nice. I got some nice pictures. The scenery is very nice. I saw some cows and sheep. At first the weather was ok, but later it began showering. And then when I wanted to get into the canoe I fell into the river once because my shoes were wet. When we went back, we had BBQ and my companions had a nice bathe in a wooden tub. Enjoy the pictures.
Hello all, It's to say to Motoi that i have bought the book from Haruki Murakami. "chronicle of the birds... " I will start to read it soon...

I would like to show some pictures to my family of all of you in the day to day life. Please Motoi, you're in Japan now, so send us some crazy pictures with you as the main actor. Something really typical, and funny of course !

Yes. I felt so sorry for Beckham;) In China somebody wrote a review for the football match called- 'Come out and See the God'. Motoi, I didn't draw the curtain. Liu said the curtains are too dark to put in the room. So maybe I will use the cloth to sew a nice skirt, hehe. I tried to make some paintings but later found out that I am lack of some art gene.

hello my dear sr20. this is motoi. finally i got my hometown, kamakura in japan. really comfortable life here. before coming back japan, i could drop in Scotland (Grasgow and Edinburg), UK(sheffiled) and Austria(Wien). i was so excited 'cause Edinburg is really beautiful city. see you soon, everyone. have a nice summer vacation! p.s. romain, julien, congrats for frace's victory against UK in eurocup. it looks really tough game, isn't it?

It is good to see a new post from Romain. I was busy with my new room these days. It is a small room but ok. We get to know some friends. Two guys are really interesting. They are newcomers too and very nice. Liu got a big old TV from a friend, and found a bed in the storage room. So now we have a lot of useful stuff. We watched Eurocup yesterday. It is really a good life with TV. The internet speed is really fast here. We downloaded some movies. I watch 2 movies per day during the weekend. Have a nice summer everyone.
Hello all, I just arrived in France yesterday. I'm happy to come back in my family and to eat so good foods. I hope to read a lot of messages here. We keep the contact. I already miss you all...

Hello nice people from ex fro20, Hope everybody's doing allright. I read your posts, it seems that life's cool for you! Sorry for being so silent but I dont spend so much time here in St-Lo... I've been to Barcelona with some friends and we got a lot of fun there. Camping, beach, parties, sun, girls? No. I'm serious of course... Now I'm thinking about my way back to Goteborg and our fantastic flat in which i should live for 2 weeks (15th to 31st of August). I guess i will be a bit nostalgic... :-( I 've found a thesis in Chalmers so far but we are under negotiations to work for a company (hope it will work, if not i'll probably spend many hours in Bulten...so unlucky ;-) ). I wish you happiness and lots of fun ! And i will try to visit the website more often !!! I miss you all. Julien.
urlLink honeymoon in Venice urlLink

Thank you for your regard Motoi. I am back. It was a tiring journey because I had to take care of my mom. Finally my mom and I are safe and back. Because I have been to Paris and Rome, there were not so many exciting places for me. But Venice was a nice place to me, although I lived in a terrible hotel. In Paris I saw the national firework. It was a fairly splendid thing, although the firework is not new for Chinese. We waited for 2 hours without dinner to see that firework. My mother became not patient. Later at around 10:30 the firework began. At the beginning it was just so so. Later it became better and better. But when we came back, the crowd was like a chaos. Hundreds of people went into subway station. People were like fishes in a can. I was really afraid to lose my mother. Thank god, later we arrived the platform together. We arrived our hotel at 1AM:(. When I was in Paris, I missed Romain and Julien. I was thinking what you were doing when I was wandering in the crowded street in Paris. Venice is a nice place. I regret that I had been there so I can not have an exicting honeymoon there. Anyway, I suggest you guys go there with your girlfriends and enjoy the water town. If I have time, I will write more and better articles for my travel. The only experience that I got in the travel is that home is always the best place.

Hello all. i hope yan is safe and enjoying her travel. i am in japan yet for my grandma and seems like i cannot do a big jorney in this summer.. it's sad. by the way, i become a betrayer against you all. i tell aurelien about this homepage. i hope you allow me, otherwise you can kill me:) >romain in japan we dont have VGN-A115B.(maybe name is different) but maybe it's good. as you know, i'm using VAIO now and i like it because the quality is that good. i think you will be satisfied it.
urlLink Romain's picture urlLink

He is too lazy to register here. So I can report his news. He is going to begin his thesis. But now it is summer holiday. So he plays games and watch football matches. I will travel for around 2 weeks. On 7.14 my mother and I will take plane to Paris. Hope I can see the national celebration. Then the journey route is Paris-Milan-Venice-Rome-Frankfort-Göteborg. If I have time, I really want to build a nice homepage for my travel. Dont feel lonely, Romain. We still gather here. The only difference is that the SoRomantic 20 room remains in a digital space...

I sent a picture from my landscape during the sunset to Yan. My computer is quite bad, and my connection too. So i'm not able to download pictures in a nice way. So the weather is really hot and sunny everyday. Sometimes, i go to swimming pool. Motoi i'm going to buy a laptop because of my frequent travels now. It was hard to sell all the components just few days before leaving Sweden. So i think i will buy a Sony... If you want the reference : Sony vaio VGN-A115B. I think, it's a really good one. We don't have so much news about Julien and Lyu. It would be nice to have some even if Lyu uses Yan to keep in touch. Well i will try to send some pictures later... Aurelien is going in Singapour soon, on saturday more exactly. I will join him the 13 of august. And today on french tv there is a transmission about Singapour on the afternoon. So Motoi when are you coming in France ? And Yan and Lyu ? And Julien ? I'm wainting for you all ! My family...
